column5: The smoke from fires reduced visibility over the weekend. As of today there is a rain fall warning for Red Lake and the surrounding area which is likely to have an impact. You can see the current conditions (video was taken this morning) below. If you have any questions you can call us at 1-800-445-4624 or email [email protected] https://canadianflyinfishing.ca/week...r-july-8-2019/
